rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description:
You slowly open your eyes as you notice a dull pain in the side of your head.
You find you are lying on a cold, wooden floor and as you stand up and take in your surroundings, you worry as you realize you have no idea where you are or how you got there.

You seem to be standing in a cramped, drafty bedroom covered in dust. Maybe by looking around a bit more, you can figure out where you are. 

You inspect the wall in front of you.

containers.name: desk
containers.description: You see a rotting wooden [32mdesk[0m propped against the wall.
containers.inspectDescript: You pull hard on a desk drawer and find it is locked. As you do so, you hear something rattle inside. Maybe there is something around to pick the lock with.

portal.name: kitchenDoor
portal.description: You see a [33mdoor[0m with peeling white paint.

containers.name: painting
containers.description: You see a [32mpainting[0m crookedly hanging on a wall.
containers.inspectDescript: The painting shows a faded garden with craggly trees and a small pond. It is hanging crookedly so you move to straighten it and in doing so, you hear something slide within the frame. Hmm that's odd, maybe if you find something to break open the frame, you can see what's inside.

containers.name: bed
containers.description: There is an old [32mbed[0m covered in dust and cobwebs.
containers.inspectDescript: Upon closer inspection, you oddly notice piles of dust next to the bed, as if the bed has been moved recently.

items.name: shovel
items.description: After taking a quick peek underneath the bed, you see a small hand [36mshovel[0m.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: You cautiously peer into a barren kitchen with white washed walls and a cracked tiled floor. It looks as though no one has been here in years...

portal.name: bedroomDoor
portal.description: You see a [33mdoor[0m with peeling white paint that leads back to the bedroom.

containers.name: cabinet
containers.description: You see a dusty [32mcabinet[0m in the left hand corner.
containers.inspectDescript: That's strange. The cabinet seems to be missing a handle and therefore, you can't open it.

portal.name: gardenDoor
portal.description: You see a wide glass [33mdoor[0m. You can just make out some trees through the smudged panes.

portal.name: libraryDoor
portal.description: You see an ornate mahogony [33mdoor[0m with an intricate brass doorknob.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: The wooden floorboard creeks violently as you step into a high ceilinged library.

containers.name: bookshelf
containers.description: You see a massive [32mbookshelf[0m filled with thousands of books on every shelf.

items.name: pin
items.description: All the books look dusty except for a red one on the third shelf. You pick it up and find a bobby [36mpin[0m wedged in between the pages.

containers.name: fireplace
containers.description: You see a [32mfireplace[0m with a gray brick border.

items.name: broom
items.description: You crouch down in front of the fireplace and notice a [36mbroom[0m among the fireplace tools.

portal.name: kitchenDoor
portal.description: You see an ornate mahogony [33mdoor[0m that leads back to the kitchen.

containers.name: piano
containers.inspectDescript: You look closely at the piano keys and notice the labels 'C, D, E, F, G, A, B' on them.

rooms.name: garden
rooms.description: You walk outside into what looks to be an abandoned garden. There are gnarled trees everywhere and leaves clutter the dirt ground. Your hopes of escape fade, however, as you notice the garden is enclosed by a large fence.

containers.name: pond
containers.description: You notice a deep, murky [32mpond[0m filled with fallen leaves and wilted flowers.
containers.inspectDescript: You peer into the water and can just make out something shiny in the depths below. With the water this high though, there's no way you could possibly reach to get it.

containers.name: snake
containers.description: You try not to jump as you spot a [32msnake[0m coiled up on the ground, eyeing you threateningly.
containers.inspectDescript: The snake hisses at you as you notice it lying on top of a suspicious mound of dirt. If only there were a way to get the snake to move.

containers.name: fence
containers.description: You see a [32mfence[0m in front of you.
containers.inspectDescript: Unfortunately, the fence is too high to climb. You peer through it, thinking you're only going to see trees when you suddenly notice what looks to be a trapdoor hiding underneath the tall grass. Hmmm, maybe if you can find the other end of that door, you will have found a way out!

containers.name: tree
containers.description: There is a tall, craggly oak [32mtree[0m to your right.
containers.inspectDescript: You walk to the trunk of the tree and see a golden object in the branches a few feet above you. If only there were a way to reach up there to knock it down.

containers.name: chimes
containers.description: Hanging on the side of the house, you notice metal wind [32mchimes[0m eerily clanking in the wind.
containers.inspectDescript: The chimes are made up of scraps of metal tied to string. Tied to one string, you notice a tiny, little key. You try to take it but the string won't allow it.

portal.name: kitchenDoor
portal.description: You see a wide glass [33mdoor[0m that leads back into the kitchen.
